index.desciption:
CS B.S. Student at NTHU

System Architect & Backend Tech Leader at 9dynamics

President of 7th Mei-Chu Hackathon
index.aboutMeText:
Hi! I'm the senior student at NTHU CS.

During my undergraduate studies, I worked with Prof. Jerry Chou at Nation Tsing Hua University at LSA-Lab

These years I also participated in start-ups industries, giloo and 9dynamics, as a system architect and tech-leader, and my priority is to employ microservice architecture with Kubernetes to construct reliable and flexible service.
